text: South Delta Exchange is a transit exchange located adjacent to the South Delta Recreation Centre in the community of Tsawwassen, British Columbia, Canada. Opened on October 31, 1975, the exchange serves Delta and Richmond. ==Routes== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Bay ! Route ! Destination !
